model.name: LVSE Placed Embroidery Short-Sleeved Shirt
model.disambiguatingDescription: This minimalist shirt in a technical fabric is twisted with an embroidered patch pocket on the left chest with the Floral Monogram motif. A crisp, breezy look with a slightly relaxed fit that can both elevate more informal looks or add a relaxed note to a tailored ensemble.

additionalProperty.name: detailedDescription
additionalProperty.value:
• 100% Polyester
  • White
  • Regular Fit
  • Model wears a FR M size
  • Model measurements : chest 36’’ / 92 cm, height 6' 2½’’ / 188.5 cm
  • Made in Italy
